name: The Gambler's Law
description:
Thanks to Dice God's blessing, now your dice are dependent to previous roll!

There is no gambler's fallacy anymore...only gambler's law.

P.S I found out that my game is lagging a bit when I play on browser.

So if you want to download and enjoy my game, please check the attached file.

Thanks!

Music Provide By: Friendly No Copyright Music
